name: Make rules great again: United Nations Voting Simulator
name_original: Make rules great again: United Nations Voting Simulator
description:
This is an entry to second edition of Mage Jam with a theme: there are no rules here.

Control the game with a microphone (which means you need one, doh!) to decide on most important issues. Scream, clap - just remember to don't 'booo' the option you disagree with!

Please note that the game purpose is purely satirical - while we based on some stereotypes about certain nations or politicians, we do take any specific stance on any issues raised. If you find it offensive - please just do not play it!
